sentence: The dog chased the cat, but it was a false alarm.
The teacher gave the student a book, which was very old.
The company will hire a new CEO, who has a lot of experience.
The food was delicious, but the service was terrible.
The new policy will affect all employees, except for John.
The book, which was written by my favorite author, is on the bestseller list.
The teacher asked the student to write an essay, but he forgot.
The company's stock prices have been fluctuating wildly.
The new employee is very nervous, because it's his first day.
The hotel room was nice, except for the noisy air conditioner.
The student's grades have been improving steadily.
